import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' export default class Centers extends Component { state={ centers: undefined } getCenters = async () => { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/api/centers') this.setState({ centers: response.data.centers }) } componentDidMount() { this.getCenters() } render() { const { centers } = this.state console.log(this.state); return (
{centers && centers.map((center, i) => {center.level} {student.name} {student.lastname1} {student.name2} {student.age} {student.height} {student.weight} {student.gender} {student.hip} {student.pot} {student.imc} {student.gabd} {student.vel} {student.minf} {student.abd} {student.msup} {student.fcrep} {student.fce} {student.fcrec} {student.meters} {student.ica} Ver )}
) } }
